DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK , study way drug enters leave blood tissue time ) single-ascending oral dos JNJ-54861911 healthy Japanese male participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Study JNJ-54861911 Healthy Japanese Male Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , randomize ( study medication assign participant chance ) , double-blind ( neither Investigator participant know treatment participant receives ) , placebo control ( placebo inactive substance compare drug test whether drug real effect clinical trial ) , study single-ascending dose JNJ-54861911 participant 55 75 year age . The duration study approximately 2 6 week per participant . The study consist 3 period : Screening period ( 28 2 day prior dose administration ) ; Double-blind Treatment period ( participant receive either single oral dose JNJ-54861911 placebo tablet fast condition ) ; Follow-up visit period ( 7 14 day dose administration ) . All eligible participant assign follow 3 cohort : Cohort A ( single oral dose JNJ-54861911 , 25 milligram [ mg ] placebo ) ; Cohort B ( single oral dose JNJ-54861911 , 50 mg placebo ) ; Cohort C ( single oral dose JNJ-54861911 , 100 mg placebo ) . Each cohort include 8 participant . Participants cohort randomly assign receive either single oral dose JNJ-54861911 ( n = 6 ) placebo ( n = 2 ) . Blood sample collect pre-dose 96 hour ( Day 5 ) dose understand PK characteristic JNJ-54861911 . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
